entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
